original_title: Carlos: cine-retrato de un caminante en Montevideo
overview: The "caminante" refers to a hobo who roams the countryside, a nomenclature preferred by Carlos, who once traveled all over Uruguay before becoming a homeless vagabond, or "bichiome", in the city of Montevideo. The film presents a portrait of society through the life of one marginalized individual.

production_companies.name: Instituto de Cinematografía de la Universidad de la República del Uruguay (ICUR)

title: Carlos: Film Portrait of a Montevideo Panhandler
